jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Third-Party Platform team (internally is known as 3PP) mission is to build an open platform within Gojek app, enabling third-party developers to use Gojek technologies to grow their business and providing more product/use cases to Gojek users at the same time. Some of the products that we have built are GoNews, GoGive, GoMall, GoFitness and many others.

We are looking for Partners Growth Manager that can act both strategically and tactically - from the creation of plans to the execution and analysis of business impact. Successful candidates possess a high degree of ownership and strong analytical capabilities, are great conceptual thinkers and effective, empathetic communicators and deeply understand your partner demands in order to be able to find growth solutions.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Define, measure and report the performance of all marketing channels/campaigns and assess against ROI and KPI goals
  • Develop a scalable growth strategy through multiple channels like in-app messaging, voucher allocations and digital marketing
  • Allocating partners spend and optimizing a blend of channels to hit growth targets efficiently
  • Manage customer segmentation strategy and develop smart attribution modeling, ensuring we reach the right audience with the right message, at the right place and time
  • Work with our analytics team to lead marketing analytics and ROI analysis for campaigns and channels, defining CAC and LTV, while executing robust optimization and A/B testing programs

• 2+ years of experience in internet, digital, performance marketing oriented roles – candidates with underpinnings in analytics and technology highly favorable. B2C experience is a must
  • Deep understanding of consumer metrics, market segmentation, and analytics – a data-driven strategist who understands and analyze how to tap into personal factors that will motivate and engage the user over time
  • Outstanding communication skills, both written and verbal, going from stakeholder to user to marketing coordinator and back again
  • Ability to develop a vision/strategy that instills trust and drives awareness across the company and with key executives
  • Nice to have: mass media marketing experience; experience as a key stakeholder of a technology function; experience as marketing IC in a quantitative marketing role
